snippet: To avoid a challenge from environmental groups that could delay its plans to begin drilling for oil off the coast of Alaska, Shell asked a federal court to review its oil spill response plan.
abstract: Shell, in an attempt to avoid a last-minute challenge from environmental groups that could delay its plans to begin drilling for oil off the coast of Alaska, asks a federal court to review its oil spill response plan.
lead_paragraph: To avoid a challenge from environmental groups that could delay its plans to begin drilling for oil off the coast of Alaska, Shell asked a federal court to review its oil spill response plan.
